thread.title: Mesha Blackwood
thread.title_full: Allen School of Health Sciences reviewed by Mesha Blackwood

author: Mesha Blackwood
title: Mesha Blackwood
text: My experience coming to the allean. Was one of the best experience I ever had since high school. If your looking to change your life and become a medical assistant this is the place for you. The environment was very welcoming and would refer anyone to be apart for what's going and inside.
